ValidationRule.description: Resend Authentication Email field can only be edited when Authentication Status = Yes or No. Exclude Informatica user.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND($Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name,$Profile.Name <> $Label.Integration_Profile ), NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL(Authentication_Status__c, 'Yes') , ISPICKVAL(Authentication_Status__c, 'No') )), ISCHANGED(Resend_Authentication_Email__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't Resend Authentication Email if Authentication Status is None or Completed.
